Notorious pitch invader 'Jarvo' disrupted the Cricket World Cup match between India and Australia.

articles.title: Cricket World Cup: India v Australia

articles.content:
A billion people have been waiting for four days. Or has it been four years?
The hosts are finally underway at this World Cup and who better to face than the five-time world champions?

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
